titles.title: Family Farmer and Rancher Tax Fairness Act of 2022
Family Farmer and Rancher Tax Fairness Act of 2022
A bill to exclude from gross income certain assistance provided to farmers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Family Farmer and Rancher Tax Fairness Act of 2022
This bill excludes from the gross income of certain farmers, ranchers, and forest land owners who are at financial risk payments for debt relief and for remedying past discrimination against such individuals.
